author: Anonymous Mouse
title: Problem weightage
question: Hi just wanted to ask what is the weightage for each problem in the final exam held yesterday
student_answer:
I think they might adjust the weighting based on how well the class did on that question, and that's probably the only way they'll scale the finals. 
Just like the midterm two they lower the weight of question 4 because most of the people does not do good on it.
